Meteara took a few steps forward and felt the power suddenly washing 
over her. It was like stepping from a freezer and into a furnace. Even 
though she was a Vok, she reacted the same way as transformers because 
her body was made as a transformer's.

Meteara: Be careful, friend. We now enter a zone of great power.

Firaxis and Horn followed a few steps behind, amazed by the light 
running along the ice walls.

Firaxis: What size is that thing anyways? It must be huge to light up 
that much ice!

Meteara: Indeed, it is. Look for yourself.

They came out of the tunnel and in a huge spherical cave. The sphere 
itself floated at the center of the room. It was blindingly bright and 
they had to adjust their vision to be able to see at all.

Firaxis: Woah...
(to be continued...)
